title: No, Policemen Did Not Thrash the Woman Smeared in Blood
subtitle: Woman Smeared in Blood Thrashed By Policemen Fact Check: An image of a woman smeared in blood, standing next to police personnel is being circulated on social media, with the claim that she was beaten up by the policemen.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A Google reverse image search led us to an India Today report which said that the incident is from 2016. We found several media reports, including the one published on The Quint, which said the incident took place in Uttar Pradesh's Mainpuri.

The incident took place at a busy marketplace in Kishani village, after the victim approached one of the accused and asked him the address of a certain shop in the area. A verbal spat broke out between the two parties after the accused reportedly asked her to come inside with him.

The accused hurled abuses and then attacked the couple with sticks in broad daylight as onlookers watched. The ensuing mayhem left the woman bleeding profusely from the head.
